name: Leader
author: Ram Segev

sections.description:
SMART LEAD CAPTURE
1) Capture lead automatically from any form on your website.
2) Mange leads communication right from LeaderBox (mini CRM).
3) Automatic welcome email
4) Social signature

Leader is a new free WordPress plugin that supercharged your WordPress site with a smart lead capture manager.

Multilingual & RTL supported.

Leader supports both RTL and LTR and has the option to be translated by developers to any language.

Translations

  • Hebrew – (he_IL)
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.2 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.17 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

Recommended Requirements:

  • WordPress 5.0.3 or greater
  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.5 or greater

From WordPress repository:
1. Go to Plugins -> Add New
2. Search for ‘Leader’
3. Click the ‘Install Now’ button
4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu
5. Thats it:-).

From file(zip)
1. Upload leader.zip in the add new plug page
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
3. Thats it:-).
sections.faq:
Is Leader free?

YES, Leader is free with no contacts (a.k.a leaders) limit and no user limits.

How do I set it up?

Leader is a plug&play plug-in, after activation it will automatically capture all contact forms in your website and create a new leader in your system.

Where does Leader send the email to?

Leader will send emails to the current admin that is logged and as CC to the default email of your site.

Iâ€™m not receiving emails from Leader?

WordPress uses virtual email address and it might be in your spam folder, set up SMTP or any other service such as Google app or office 365 and you will receive the email in your inbox.
sections.changelog:
1.0 beta 2018-08-09

  • Initial Public Release for Leader Codes Facebook community.

1.0 2018-09-23

  • Initial Public Release at WordPress repository.

  • Tweak: Getting form source title and link to Leader page.

  • New: Capture dropdown, radio button and check-box from contact form.

  • New: Sort leaders by last message.

1.0.1 2018-10-06

  • Fix: remove preventdefault from forms with no email field

1.1.0 2018-10-20

  • New: Leader Connections.

  • New: Leader Welcome email message .

  • New: Click to call button at leader page.

2.0.0 2019-02-06

  • New: Leader Hello Bar.

  • Tweak: Capture email and phone field by content, not just by field type.

  • Tweak: Leader Connections is now Leader Signature with a social email signature.

  • New: Leader Spam filter.

  • Bug: Code improvement and bugs fix.

2.5.0 2019-06-18

  • New: Leader Form.

  • New: Leader Video popup.

  • New: Leader menu added to admin bar.

  • Tweak: Upload image to Leader Social signature.

  • Tweak: Different Leader welcome mail for each of leader component.

  • Tweak: Design changes.

  • Tweak: Position control to Leader Hello Bar.

  • Bug: Code improvement and bugs fix.

2.5.1 2019-07-01

  • Bug: Code improvement, bugs fix and design fixes.

2.5.2 2019-07-04

  • Bug: Code improvement, bugs fix and design fixes

2.5.3 2019-07-07

  • Tweak: Improved form capture algorithm

2.5.4 2019-07-08

  • New: Leader notifications

  • New: video popup redirect option

  • New: Welcome mail default text

2.5.5 2019-07-17

  • Bug: internalization and design fixes

2.6 2019-09-11

  • Tweak: remove all Leader contact forms
